title: Calories in 1 lb Ground Turkey
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 lb ground turkey, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and easy tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Raw, 93% lean ground turkey (7% fat); no seasonings or additives; 1 lb â‰ˆ 454 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by lean percentage, brand, raw vs. cooked state, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 lb raw 93% lean ground turkey provides ~681 kcal and ~85 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp olive oil for cooking

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 lb of ground turkey?
faqs.a: About 681 kcal for 1 lb raw 93% lean ground turkey.

faqs.q: Is ground turkey lower in calories than ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, 93% lean ground turkey has ~150 kcal per 100 g vs. ~250 kcal for 80% lean ground beef.

faqs.q: How much protein in 1 lb ground turkey?
Does cooking change calories in ground turkey?
faqs.a: Calories per gram may increase due to water loss, but total energy remains similar unless fat is drained.

faqs.q: What affects calories in ground turkey the most?
faqs.a: Lean-to-fat ratio; 85% lean adds ~50 kcal per 100 g compared to 93% lean.
